testCases.explanation: The number 2 appears twice in the array
The number 3 appears twice in the array
Minimal case with n=1: only two elements, 1 is duplicated
2 appears multiple times; must still find the duplicate

description: Given an array of integers nums containing n+1 integers where each integer is in the range [1, n] inclusive, there is only one repeated number. Return that repeated number. You must solve the problem without modifying the array nums and uses only constant extra space.

examples.explanation: 2 is the only number that appears more than once.
3 is the only number that appears more than once.

constraints: All the integers in nums appear only once except for precisely one integer which appears two or more times
